data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konstantinov, Fedor, Simov, Nikolay (2014): A new Cleotomiris species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae) from North Korea. Zootaxa 3786 (1): 65-72, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3786.1.4
